name: identify the
description:
Unlock a new PC with an empty flash drive, a touch sensitive keyboard and a massive collection of games. Jump into a multiplayer arena and take on 15 modes written by our own designer, Dave Taylor. The more you play, the more you unlock.
You can download Outhouse Media's PC games from here. Outhouse Media also provides downloadable games for the Raspberry Pi, but they all need to be put on a USB storage device first. If you don't have a USB thumb drive to store your games, then you can download our handy guide to portable USB storage devices. Note: All of the games are available as 32-bit and 64-bit versions. You can also buy the boxes individually and play all versions at once.
